title: Why aren't champions like Renekton picked more
body: The cunt just builds a brutalizer, pushes you out of lane and build full tank then proceeds to solo your entire team. I don't really see a lot of counterplay to champions having that sort of ability, so why aren't these broken pos played more, fucking noobs

replies.body: Don't build brutaliser or ravenous. Elitists rush LW.
People use to follow the META. Like lissandra now. Renek use to be played constantly season 2 for a long while with shyvana.
Or go Morellonomicon... (Not on ryze, on AP Tops. Eg AP Offtank Annie.)

Renekton gets F'd in the A by ranged champions. It was the Rise of Ryze that bullied Renekton out of contention.

Ryze got nerfed, Renekton got buffed, so he is back. Pick Trundle/Ryze/Quinn/Olaf and you can do fine.

> Ryze got nerfed

His %%%% scales with max mana.

You can't even use him...
